subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The 30-yard field goal that Jets place-kicker Mike Nugent was lining up to try late Monday night at Dolphin Stadium was the biggest of his two-year N.F.L. career.
snippet: The 30-yard field goal that Jets place-kicker Mike Nugent was lining up to try late Monday night at Dolphin Stadium was the biggest of his two-year N.F.L. career.
